item.title: Wasserstein convergence of Cech persistence diagrams for samplings of submanifolds
item.description: This paper proves that Čech persistence diagrams converge to the true underlying shape precisely when using Wasserstein distances with p > m, where m is the submanifold dimension, significantly advanc…
